Portfolio

  • Mundipagg's Website

    Acted as: Front-end developer and illustrator.

    Took part in the Front-end implementation of Mundipagg's website in Nuxt, and gave support for the illustrations.

  • Mundipagg's Backoffice extension

    Acted as: Front-end developer and designer.

    Chrome and Firefox extension made in Vue. Designed to be used by internal CRM and Developer teams, where they can search for users and entities easily, through development, staging and production environments. I took part in the conception and was the primary develper.

  • Emerald Design System

    Acted as: Front-end developer and designer.

    Co-created the Emerald Css library used by Mundipagg's applications. We use PatternLab to develop with the Atomic Design principles as a base methodology. I was the primary developer for the Styleguide, made with Jekyll.

  • Mundipagg's Checkout

    Acted as: Front-end developer and designer.

    I implemented both Mundipagg's Checkout applications. The webapp is made in Vue using the Emerald library. And the script, called Lightbox, to open this application as modal in our client's website.

  • EnneThing iPhone

    Acted as: illustrator, designer and developer (Swift).

    Newest version of the iOS Augmented Reality app for my business card and personal tattoo.

  • EnneThing iPad

    Acted as: illustrator, designer and developer (Swift).

    Newest version of the iOS Augmented Reality app for iPad.

  • Zee.now

    Acted as: Freelancer iOS Software Engineer.

    Zee.dog's app for 24h free delivery of pet products.

  • TattooAR

    Acted as: illustrator, designer and developer (Swift/Objective-C).

    iOS Augmented Reality application for temporary tattoos.

  • EnneThing v1

    Acted as: illustrator, designer and developer (Swift/Objective-C).

    First version of the iOS Augmented Reality app for my business card and tattoo.

  • Hemopics

    Acted as: Freelancer iOS Software Engineer.

    Photography app made for Hemorio (Instituto Estadual de Hematologia do Rio de Janeiro) campaign, with informative filter containing the percentage amount of the blood bank.

    Personal project of drawings on the skin
